title: Cheshmeh Sefid, Sepidan
text: Cheshmeh Sefid (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Cheshmeh Sefīd) is a village in <a href="Khafri%20Rural%20District">Khafri Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Sepidan%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Sepidan%20County">Sepidan County</a>, <a href="Fars%20Province">Fars Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 19, in 6 families.
